amendment.description: To expand the extension of authority of the Secretary of Transportation and provide additional obligation authority for the highway bridge program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2792 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 60 - 33. Record Vote Number: 329.

action.text: Amendment SA 2792 proposed by Senator Murray to Amendment SA 2791. (consideration: CR S11294-11297, S11304-11305; text: CR S11294) To expand the extension of authority of the Secretary of Transportation and provide additional obligation authority for the highway bridge program.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 2792 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 60 - 33. Record Vote Number: 329.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2792 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 60 - 33. Record Vote Number: 329.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2792 proposed by Senator Murray to Amendment SA 2791.
